page.title: 17WELSHPOOL TOWN COUNCIL
page.content: The 13 members of the Council hold their meetings once a month, plus committee meetings. The council is split into three committees which deal with, the Town Hall, the Recreation Ground and the Armoury Sports Centre. There is a market held on the lower floor of the Town Hall with the upper floor being rented out for discos and fund raising. On the Recreation Ground is the cricket club and football pitches while the Armoury houses the squash courts and sports hall. The Council are also trustees of the Burgess land on which they have already built some houses. To raise money for the events that they sponsor they take a proportion of the household rates. Some areas of expenditure are met by the Montgomery District Council.
